properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Stripping topsoil and including cut and lift up to 1.5m and haul 30m distance by manually [200m long x 2.0m x 0.05m thk.]

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm ) [200m long x 2.0m]

Planting Bamboo species and Vetiver grass or R
